Archangel's Staff.description: Each time the wearer casts their ability, they gain spell power equal to 35% maximum mana.
Archangel's Staff.shadow-description: Each time the holder casts their ability, they gain empty maximum Health equal to 300% of their maximum Mana. The holder then heals for that amount.

Bloodthirster.description: Basic attacks heal for 40% of the damage dealt. Gains a 30% maximum health shield for 5 seconds if the wearer falls below 40% maximum health.
Bloodthirster.shadow-description: Physical damage heals the holder for 40% of the damage dealt. Each time the holder heals to 90% Health, they gain 30% Attack Speed for 3 seconds (does not stack). The holders takes 33% of their maximum Health as true damage at the beginning of combat.

Bramble Vest.description: Negates bonus damage from critical strikes on the wearer. When the wearer is hit by a basic attack, deals 80/100/150 (depending on Star level) magic damage to all nearby enemies (2.5 second cooldown).

Quicksilver.description: The wearer is immune to crowd control for the first 10 seconds of combat. (Unique: only one per champion)
Quicksilver.shadow-description: The wearer is immune to crowd control, but has 20% less max health.

Blue Buff.description: After each spellcast, the wearer's mana is set to 20. (Unique: only one per champion)
Blue Buff.shadow-description: After casting their spell, the wearer's Mana is set to 15. If the wearer has less than 60% health, this is increased to 50. (Unique: only one per champion)

Chalice of Power.description: At the start of combat, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row to the left and right gain 25 ability power for the rest of combat.
Chalice of Power.shadow-description: When combat begins, all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 40 Spell Power for the rest of combat. The wearer loses 20 Spell Power.

Deathblade.description: Each time the holder casts their ability, they gain empty maximum Health equal to 300% of their maximum Mana. The holder then heals for that amount.
Deathblade.shadow-description: Contributing to a kill grants +15 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 3 stacks). The wearer receives a penalty of -20% max health.

Shroud of Stillness.description: When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead and behind in a 1.5-hex line that delays affected allies (excluding the wearer) and enemies' first spellcast, increasing their maximum mana by 65% until they cast. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Shroud of Stillness.shadow-description: When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead in a 1.5-hex line that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their maximum mana by 35% until they cast. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]

Dragon's Claw.shadow-description: Reduces incoming magic damage by 15%. Negates bonus damage from Critical strike icon.png critical hits.

Sunfire Cape.description: At start of combat, and every 2.5 seconds thereafter, applies a 10-second burn to a random enemy within 2 hexes, dealing 2.5% of target's maximum health true damage each second and applying Grievous Wounds for the duration, reducing healing on the target. (Unique)
Sunfire Cape.shadow-description: Every 1.5 seconds, a random enemy within 3 hexes is burned for 25% of their maximum Health over 10 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%. The wearer is also burned for 4% of their maximum Health every second. (Unique)

Giant Slayer.description: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 10% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1750 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 70%.
Giant Slayer.shadow-description: The holders abilities and attacks do 45% bonus damage. If the target has less than 1100 maximum Health, the holder's Abilities and attacks do 15% decreased damage instead.

Guardian Angel.description: Prevents the wearer's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 400 Health and shed all negative effects.
Guardian Angel.shadow-description: Prevents the holder's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 80% Health and shed all negative effects. After this effect trigger's, the holder's Attack Speed is reduced by 50% for the rest of combat.

Last Whisper.description: Critical strike hits reduce the target's armor by 70% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Last Whisper.shadow-description: When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor and Magic Resist are reduced by 50% for 2 seconds. The holder's Armor and Magic Resist are also permanently reduced by 50%.

Force of Nature.description: Wearer's team gains +2 maximum team size but the player's Little Legends takes 100% extra damage.

Frozen Heart.description: Reduces the Attack Speed of enemies within 2 Hexes by 35%. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Frozen Heart.shadow-description: Reduces the Attack Speed of all enemies within 2 hexes by 50%. Each Frozen Heart a champion carries beyond the first increases the radius of this effect. The Attack Speed of allies (except the wearer) within 1 hex is reduced by 50%.

Gargoyle Stoneplate.description: The holder gains 18 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for each enemy targeting them.
Gargoyle Stoneplate.shadow-description: Every 2 seconds, the wearer heals themselves for 45 Health for each unit targeting them.

Guinsoo's Rageblade.description: Basic attacks grant 6% bonus attack speed for the rest of combat. Stacks with no upper limit.
Guinsoo's Rageblade.shadow-description: Attacks grant +8% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. The bonus Attack Speed can stack any number of times. The holder is dealt 3% of their maximum Health as true damage each attack.

Hand of Justice.description: At the start of each round, randomly gains one of the following buffs: Grants 40 bonus attack damage and 40 spell power, or Basic attacks and abilities heal for 40% of the damage dealt.
Hand of Justice.shadow-description: The holder begins combat with two buffs: +40 Attack Damage and +40 Spell Power; Basic Attacks and Spells heal for 40% of damage dealt After each takedown, if the holder has these buffs, they lose them; if they do not, they get both buffs again.

Hextech Gunblade.description: Abilities heal for 33% of the damage dealt. Excess healing with this item is converted into a shield up to 300 health.
Hextech Gunblade.shadow-description: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heals the nearest ally with missing Health for 60% of the damage dealt. This heal cannot affect the holder.

Infinity Edge.description: Converts every 1% excess critical strike chance into 1% bonus critical strike damage.
Infinity Edge.shadow-description: Grants +75% Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage. The holder also gains 30% Critical Strike Damage. Each time the holder critically strikes, they deal 3% of their maximum Health to themselves as true damage. [Unique - Only one per champion]

Ionic Spark.description: Enemies within 2 hexes have their magic resistance reduced by 40% (does not stack). Additionally, when enemies within 2 hexes cast their Special Ability, they are dealt 200% of their maximum mana as magic damage.
Ionic Spark.shadow-description: Enemies and allies within 2 hexes are zapped when they cast an ability, taking magic damage scaling with their max Mana. Enemies take 200% of their max mana, and allies take 100% of their max mana. Whenever an ally or enemy is zapped, the wearer gains 5 Ability Power for the rest of combat.

Jeweled Gauntlet.description: The wearer's Special Ability can critically strike. Additionally, grants 40% bonus critical strike damage.
Jeweled Gauntlet.shadow-description: The holder's spells can inflict critical hits. Gain 40% Critical Strike Damage and 20% Critical Strike Chance, but when the wearer casts they lose 15% of the maximum Health.

Locket of the Iron Solari.description: At the start of combat, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row to the left and right gain a 300 / 350 / 400 (based on Star level) health shield for 8 seconds.
Locket of the Iron Solari.shadow-description: The holder and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row take 25% reduced damage. but gain 5 less Mana per attack.

Morellonomicon.description: Dealing magic damage with a spell applies a burn on the enemies hit for 10 seconds, dealing 2.5% of target's maximum health true damage each second and applying Grievous Wounds for the duration, reducing healing on the target. (Unique - Only 1 Per Champion)
Morellonomicon.shadow-description: When the holder deals magic damage with their spell, the spell deals 50% less damage but they burn the target, dealing 100% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 25 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn. (Unique - Only 1 Per Champion)

Rabadon's Deathcap.shadow-description: The holder gains 125% additional Ability Power. The holder receives a penalty of -20% Max Health.

Rapid Firecannon.description: Increases the wearer's attack range by 1 hex, and basic attacks cannot miss.
Rapid Firecannon.shadow-description: Increases the holder's Attack Range by 1 hex. Additionally, the holder gains +40% bonus Attack Speed when there are no enemies within 2 hex. The holder's attacks can no longer miss.

Redemption.description: Every 5 seconds, the wearer radiates an aura to allies within 1 hex, healing them for 25% missing health. Affected allies take 30% reduced damage from multi-target abilities and basic attacks for 5 seconds.
Redemption.shadow-description: The holder radiates an aura to all allies on the board except themself, and heals them for 15% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. Each time this happens, the holder damages themselves for 10% of their current Health as true damage.

Runaan's Hurricane.description: Basic attacks fire an additional bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 75% AD physical damage and applying on-hit effects. Bolts can critically strike and have infinite range.
Runaan's Hurricane.shadow-description: The holder's attacks fire bolts at 2 nearby enemies, dealing 60% of the holder's Attack Damage. These bolts can critically strike but do not apply on-hit effects.

Spear of Shojin.description: Basic attacks restore an additional 8 mana on-attack.
Spear of Shojin.shadow-description: The wearer's attacks restore 14 additional Mana. The wearer deals 20% less damage.

Statikk Shiv.description: Every third basic attack from the wearer deals 70 magic damage to the target and 3 additional targets, while also reducing their magic resistance by 70% for 5 seconds.
Statikk Shiv.shadow-description: Every other attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that strikes 4 enemy, dealing 55 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 70% for 5 seconds. The holder receives -50% Attack Damage.

Thief's Gloves.description: At the beginning of each round, the wearer equips 2 random items that are removed at the end of the round. The quality of these items are based on player level. Cannot be equipped to a champion that already holds another item, nor can the item holder be equipped with any additional items. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Thief's Gloves.shadow-description: Consumes 3 Item Slots At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. These Items are always full shadow items.

Titan's Resolve.description: When the wearer takes damage from any source or inflicts a critical hit, grants 3 bonus attack damage and 3 spell power for the rest of combat, stacking up 25 times for a maximum of 75. At maximum stacks, additionally gains 25 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance, and increases in size. Resets every round.
Titan's Resolve.shadow-description: Every 4 seconds, the holder's next attack deals 40% of the total damage they have taken since the last empowered attack as true damage.

Trap Claw.description: At the beginning of each round, gains a spell shield that blocks the first enemy spell that hit. The enemy that breaks the shield is stunned for 4 seconds. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Trap Claw.shadow-description: Blocks the first enemy spell that hits the wearer, then teleports them to the spell's caster, and causes both units to start targeting each other. They deal 20% increased damage to each other.

Zephyr.description: At the start of combat, banishes for 5 seconds the unit that mirrors the wielder's placement on the other side of the board. Pierces through CC immunity effects. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Zephyr.shadow-description: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds. Ignores CC immunity. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]

Zz'Rot Portal.description: When the holder dies, a Construct with 500 Health arises to continue the fight. When it dies it deals 777 true damage to enemies within 1 hex(es).
Zz'Rot Portal.shadow-description: At the start of combat, the wearer taunts all nearby enemies for 1 second. Additionally, when the wearer dies, a Construct with 1500/2250/3000 health (depending on Star level), arises to continue the fight. Constructs also gain 0−200 bonus armor and magic resistance (depending on the construct's stage)

Warmog's Armor.shadow-description: Grants 1500 bonus health, but the wearer loses 100 Health each second.

Zeke's Herald.description: At the start of combat, banishes for 5 seconds the unit that mirrors the wielder's placement on the other side of the board. Pierces through CC immunity effects. [Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Zeke's Herald.shadow-description: When combat begins, the holder reduces the Attack Speed of all allies within 1 hexes in the same row by -25% Attack Speed. The holder then gains +40% Attack Speed for each affected ally.
